plot: Three friends kill some time on a cream sofa. With nowhere to go and nothing to talk about, the cracks soon begin to appear in their relationships.
title: Sofa
plot_es: Three friends kill some time on a cream sofa. With nowhere to go and nothing to talk about, the cracks soon begin to appear in their relationships.
plot_en: Three friends kill some time on a cream sofa. With nowhere to go and nothing to talk about, the cracks soon begin to appear in their relationships.
